page.title: 05VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: UMBERLEIGH GARAGE Umberleigh garage sells alot of things-here is a list of some of them:-petrol,cars new and used,oil, car accessories,spares and paraffin. It is an M.O.T. testing station which does car body repairs. The garage is open from 8am-6.30pm Mon-Sat. The garage has 6 employees. In a busy day the garage can service 3 cars. Most of the customers are local and regular. They sell more petrol in the summer then in the winter. It has been here since 1975. It sells about 750-800 gallons of petrol a week. The garage has been robbed once or twice. It has never been rebuilt but it has been extended. They repair punctures in front tractor tyres.
